      Tile Edge.getOtherTile(Tile currentTile)
      Gets the tile on the other side of the edge, given one of the tiles (the Edge can't predict which tile is known and which is wanted)

      Moves the character to the tile in the given direction.

      Constructor and Description

      Constructs a character
      Edge(Tile tile1, Tile tile2, boolean crossable)
      Creates an edge, setting the two tiles and the crossable variable If the edge is between a tile and the boundary of a level, the extra tile is to be null

      Creates the edge, and sets the edge for the two tiles in the given directions.
